channel.title: [PI] Out of memory error? help please?
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/406/error2w.png/][IMG]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/8852/error2w.png[/img][/URL]
Any idea what to do/fix? please help me, thank you.

item.title: [PI] Out of memory error? help please?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“rpl, post:6, topic:433412”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=536132.msg3920379#msg3920379 date=1329646388]

I got an extra 1gb, the lag shouldn’t be that bad… and help me javatc? do you have teamviewer?

Why would he need to TV you for an issue like this? Play around with the heap space (Xmx) options in your batch file.
[/quote]
The server used to be on xmx1000, i changed it to 300 and it did nothing…[/quote]

You might have a memory leak somewhere in your code.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Out of memory error? help please?

item.title: [PI] Out of memory error? help please?

I got an extra 1gb, the lag shouldn’t be that bad… and help me javatc? do you have teamviewer?
[/quote]

Why would he need to TV you for an issue like this? Play around with the heap space (Xmx) options in your batch file.[/quote]
The server used to be on xmx1000, i changed it to 300 and it did nothing…
